      • Bullet

        public Bullet​(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              processing.core.PImage image,
              int damage,
              int duration,
              double angle,
              int speed)
        Creates a new bullet
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate
        y - center y coordinate
        width - width of bullet
        height - height of bullet
        image - Pimage image of bullet
        damage - damage of bullet
        duration - duration of bullet
        angle - angle of bullet shot
        speed - speed of bullet shot

      • Bullet

        public Bullet​(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
              int duration,
              int damage,
              int speed)
        Creates bullet for storage purposes
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet drawer to store image
        duration - duration of bullet
        damage - damage of bullet
        speed - speed of bullet shot

    • Method Detail

      • checkDuration

        public boolean checkDuration()
        Checks if bullet duration is complete
        Returns:
        true if the current duration is less than 0, otherwise false

        Moves the bullet

        public Bullet createBullet​(double angle,
                           int x,
                           int y)
        Creates a bullet in order to represent firing of weapon
        Parameters:
        angle - angle bullet is shot at
        x - x coordinate to be spawned at
        y - y coordinate to be spawned at
        Returns:
        new Bullet object
